channel.title: Owner Privalages
channel.description: How can i make it where, only owners can wear like a certain armor.. If an admin, mod, or reg player would try, it wouldnt allow them.. Anyone knows?

item.title: Owner Privalages
item.dc:creator: @RSC_n33b RSC_n33b
item.description:
@RSC_n33b wrote:

what he means is if you are a mod admin owner you can put it on when you have 70 defence but if you are not an mod admin or owner you cannot put it on in the first place

Read full topic

item.title: Owner Privalages
item.dc:creator: @x_P_U_R_E_x x P U R E x
item.description:
@x_P_U_R_E_x wrote:

so how would i make it where it would remove the item?

Read full topic

item.title: Owner Privalages
item.dc:creator: @U_WAN_DIE U WAN DIE?
item.description:
@U_WAN_DIE wrote:

That’s because his code is doing this:

if (ItemID == 15351) {
if (playerRights >= 1) {
return 70;
} else if (playerRights <= 0) {
sendMessage(“You need Moderator priveleges to wield this weapon!”);
}
}

If the item id is 15333 and the player’s rights are greater than 1, the item will require 70 defense, but if your privileges are less than 1, you can wear the item without any defense requirements.

Read full topic

item.title: Owner Privalages
item.dc:creator: @x_P_U_R_E_x x P U R E x
item.description:
@x_P_U_R_E_x wrote:

Ok man, code looks great but theirs a problem… I got it in the client.java… I added what i needed for my armor… But i had demoted myself to test it, and i can still wear the armor… It just warns me that i need the privalages… Would you know how to make it where it would automatically take off the armor or wouldnt even allow to put it on?

Read full topic

item.title: Owner Privalages
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“0.o, post:2, topic:223450”]Just finished making a code that I believe works for this -

Search for

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

Under that try adding this -

if (ItemID == 15351) { if (playerRights >= 1) { return 70; } else if (playerRights <= 0) { sendMessage("You need Moderator priveleges to wield this weapon!"); } }

This is to make a saradomin sword mod or higher to wield, to make it armor, first off, change what you search for -

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID)

to

public int GetCLDefense(int ItemID)

Then change the item ID to the ID of the armor.

Also 70 is the level you need to wield it.[/quote]
doesnt work lol

nvm lol i messed up thats why:P sowwy it works perfect

nvm doesnt work lol only works until 70 atk:P

Read full topic

item.title: Owner Privalages
item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

Just finished making a code that I believe works for this -

Search for

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

Under that try adding this -

if (ItemID == 15351) { if (playerRights >= 1) { return 70; } else if (playerRights <= 0) { sendMessage("You need Moderator priveleges to wield this weapon!"); } }

This is to make a saradomin sword mod or higher to wield, to make it armor, first off, change what you search for -

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID)

to

public int GetCLDefense(int ItemID)

Then change the item ID to the ID of the armor.

Also 70 is the level you need to wield it.

Read full topic
